data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: This is with reference to our letter dated 05th November, 2024 wherein we had informed you that Earnings Conference Call with investors of the Company will be held on 13th November, 2024 to discuss Q2 & H1 FY25 Results. Please note that the said conference call as scheduled was held today at 11.30 a.m. (IST).In compliance with regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, 2015 read with Schedule III, given below is the link to access the audio recording of the Earnings Conference Call:  https://www.sutlejtextiles.com/pdf/Earning%20Call/Audio%20Link_Q2FY25.mp3
